sub_title: Portfolio Management Support Specialist – Green Climate Fund Readiness Portfolio at UNDP
summary:
I am an experienced Climate Change and Water Management Specialist, with experience in adaptation, mitigation, water planning and sustainable development.  I have worked at a national leadership level and as an advisor to the Governmental Ministers, both as an employed advisor and having won consultancies an independent Climate Change Consultant.
  
My key skills and experiences are:
•	Project management of national and international projects.
•	I have lead a team of 50 people in my role as National Director of Climate Change Mitigation and worked within a team structure throughout my career..
•	Development and strategic consulting on climate change vulnerability, adaptation and climate change mitigation, international climate change negotiations (UNFCCC), low carbon strategies (GHG inventories, baselines and MRV), REDD+ mechanism, NAMAS, NAPs, sustainable indicators, environmental footprint methods.
•	Stakeholder management, and  policy making processes and strategy development
•	Environmental modelling (WaterWorld, SWAT, Cristal, WEAP and LEAP) and GIS.
